price: (103) And if they had believed and feared Allāh, then the reward from Allāh would have been [far] better, if they only knew.
arabic: وَلَوۡ أَنَّهُمۡ ءَامَنُواْ وَٱتَّقَوۡاْ لَمَثُوبَةٞ مِّنۡ عِندِ ٱللَّهِ خَيۡرٞۚ لَّوۡ كَانُواْ يَعۡلَمُونَ

version.title: English Translation - Saheeh International
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into English - Saheeh International - Al-Muntada Al-Islami (Islamic Forum)

meta.transliteration: walaw annahum āmanū wa-ittaqaw lamathūbatun min ʿindi al-lahi khayrun law kānū yaʿlamūna
